name: The Test Talent
description: This is the description of the talent where you get to spot one <dice-one c=red" p="y"></dice-one>
column13: and finally one <dice-two n="8" c1="red" c2="green"></dice-two> dice. Here I try to give the talent a very long description to see how it interacts with the level being shown in the corner."
